amendment.description: To exclude employees of the Transportation Security Administration from the collective bargaining rights of Federal employees and provide employment rights and an employee engagement mechanism for passenger and property screeners.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 14 as modified, pursuant to the order of 2/14/2011, having failed to achieve the required 60 votes for the adoption of the amendment, was withdrawn in Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 14 as modified not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 17.

action.text: Amendment SA 14 proposed by Senator Wicker. (consideration: CR S501-502, S532, S538; text: CR S501) To exclude employees of the Transportation Security Administration from the collective bargaining rights of Federal employees and provide employment rights and an employee engagement mechanism for passenger and property screeners.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 14 as modified not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 17.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 14 as modified not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 17.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 14 proposed by Senator Wicker.
